By waaay extensive I meant as in on the very verge of death, like 
beyond stasis lock (I know there's nothing beyond it, but I mean like 
when the bot's already dying). It can repair a stasis-locked bot 
though.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kevin Ramsey <kramsey20@y...> wrote:
> It's WAAAAAY extense. How else do you explain the
> stasis lock?
